main.description: A piece of evidence related to a hypercert record (e.g. an activity, project, claim, or evaluation). Evidence may support, clarify, or challenge the referenced subject.

subject.description: A strong reference to the record this evidence relates to (e.g. an activity, project, claim, or evaluation).

content.description: A piece of evidence (URI or blob) related to the subject record; it may support, clarify, or challenge a hypercert claim.

title.description: Title to describe the nature of the evidence.

shortDescription.description: Short description explaining what this evidence shows.

description.description: Longer description describing the evidence in more detail.

relationType.description: How this evidence relates to the subject.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created
